00003 # ifndef QuEST_PRECISION
00004 # define QuEST_PRECISION
00005 
00006 // *** EDIT PRECISION HERE
00007 // OPTIONS: 1, 2, 4
00008 # define PREC 2
00009 
00010 # if PREC==1
00011         // SINGLE PRECISION
00012         # define REAL float
00013         # define MPI_QuEST_REAL MPI_FLOAT
00014         # define REAL_STRING_FORMAT "%.8f"
00015         # define REAL_EPS 1e-5
00016 # elif PREC==4
00017         // QUAD PRECISION
00018         // 80-bit precision for most implementations
00019         # define REAL long double
00020         # define MPI_QuEST_REAL MPI_LONG_DOUBLE
00021         # define REAL_STRING_FORMAT "%.17Lf"
00022         # define REAL_EPS 1e-14
00023 # else
00024         // DOUBLE PRECISION
00025         # define REAL double
00026         # define MPI_QuEST_REAL MPI_DOUBLE
00027         # define REAL_STRING_FORMAT "%.14f"
00028         # define REAL_EPS 1e-13
00029 # endif
00030 
00031 
00032 # endif
